author: Chris Blake
title: India's 1.3 billion locked down as virus surges elsewhere
description: NEW DELHI (AP) — The world's largest democracy went under the world's biggest lockdown Wednesday, with India's 1.3 billion people ordered to stay home in a bid to stop the coronavirus pandemic...
